name: DC Universe Online: War of the Light Part I
name_original: DC Universe Online: War of the Light Part I
description:
DC Universe Online: War of the Light Part I is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by WBIE. It came out on 28-01-2014. It was published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play DC Universe Online: War of the Light Part I on PC and PlayStation 3.
